trans-unit.source: Represents the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: Representa a estrutura de menu de um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> replaces and adds functionality to the MainMenu control of previous versions, MainMenu is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> substitui e adiciona funcionalidades ao controlo MainMenu das versões anteriores, MainMenu é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e para utilização futura, se escolher.

trans-unit.source: The MainMenu control represents the container for the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de MainMenu representa o contentor para a estrutura de menu de um formulário.

trans-unit.source: A menu is composed of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: É composto por um menu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos que representam os comandos de menu individuais na estrutura de menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>pode ser um comando para a sua aplicação ou um menu principal para outros itens do submenu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To bind the MainMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will display it, assign the MainMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar o enlace a MainMenu a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>que será apresentá-lo, atribua o MainMenu para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For applications that will have support for multiple languages, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A> property to display the text of the menu from right to left to support languages such as Arabic.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicações com suporte para vários idiomas, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A>propriedade para apresentar o texto do menu de direita para a esquerda para suporte de idiomas, tais como árabe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create different MainMenu objects to represent different menu structures for your form.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar objetos de MainMenu diferentes para representar estruturas de menu diferente para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: If you want to reuse the menu structure contained in a specific MainMenu, you can use its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A> method to create a copy.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender reutilizar a estrutura de menu contida num MainMenu específico, pode utilizar o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A>método para criar uma cópia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.CloneMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have a copy of the menu structure, you can make the appropriate modifications for your new menu structure.
trans-unit.target: Assim que tiver uma cópia da estrutura de menu, pode efetuar as modificações adequadas para a estrutura de menu novo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Cutting and pasting menu items from one form to another in the designer might not work as expected if the form you are pasting into has no menu items defined.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Corte e itens de menu de colar a partir de uma forma para outra no designer poderão não funcionar conforme esperado se o formulário que está a colar tem não existem itens de menu definidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> class without any specified menu items.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> classe sem qualquer especificado de itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: This version of the constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> without any specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do construtor cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>sem qualquer especificado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: To add menu items to the control use the other version of this constructor that accepts an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects as its parameter or use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar itens de menu para o controlo de utilizam a outra versão deste construtor que aceita uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos, como o parâmetro ou utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> class with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> classe com o contentor especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> representing the container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> que representa o contentor do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> with a specified set of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> com um conjunto especificado de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to assign an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> at the time of its creation.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este construtor para atribuir uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>no momento da respetiva criação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> has been created you can add additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>foi criado pode adicionar adicionais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects that will be added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> objetos que serão adicionados ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that is a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> que é um duplicado da atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create a copy of the menu structure stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para criar uma cópia da estrutura de menu armazenada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to reuse the menu structure stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> as the foundation for a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para reutilizar a estrutura de menu armazenada um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>como a base para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a menu structure that has the same menu items as an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> but will also have additional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects added to it, you can use the CloneMenu method to create a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and then add the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects to the cloned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se pretender criar uma estrutura de menu que tem os mesmo itens de menu como uma existente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, mas também irá ter adicionais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos adicionados à mesma, pode utilizar o método CloneMenu para criar uma cópia do original <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>e, em seguida, adicione os novos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos a clonado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that represents the cloned menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> que representa o menu clonado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the main menu collapses.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o menu principal fecha.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new handle to the Menu.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo identificador ao Menu.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the menu if the method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador ao menu se o método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes dos recursos, que não sejam de memória, utilizada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>para a memória foi occupying pode ser recuperada através da recolha de lixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>está a utilizar não irá ser libertado até chamadas de recolha de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>destrutor do objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that contains this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> que contém este controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is parented to a form.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite-lhe determinar se específico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>está associada a um formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: The property is typically used when multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> objects are being used on a form and you need to determine which one is currently being used by a form.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é normalmente utilizado quando várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>objetos estão a ser utilizados num formulário e terá de determinar qual delas é atualmente a ser utilizado por um formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that is the container for this control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> que é o contentor para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> is not currently hosted on a form.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> não estar atualmente alojado num formulário.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu.Collapse"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCollapse method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnCollapse também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se é apresentado o texto apresentado pelo controlo de direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade permite que os menus de suporte de idiomas que são escritos a partir da direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text will be displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como `RightToLeft.Yes`, será apresentado o texto do item de menu da direita para a esquerda em vez da predefinição restantes para o método adequado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter mais informações sobre como ativar o alinhamento de direita para a esquerda afeta os controlos de formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é um membro válido do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The return string includes the type and the string returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A> method if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is assigned to a form.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de retorno inclui o tipo e a cadeia devolvida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A>método se as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>é atribuído a um formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref>.
